title: 2025 Saudi Arabian GP results - Piastri wins as Verstappen is penalised
summary: Piastri scored his second consecutive victory of 2025 in the Saudi Arabian GP after Verstappen was penalised for a start incident

qa_pairs.question: Which driver won the 2025 Saudi Arabian Grand Prix?
What was the reason for Max Verstappen's penalty during the 2025 Saudi Arabian GP?
How many consecutive victories did Oscar Piastri achieve with his win in the 2025 Saudi Arabian GP?
